name: raCOGNiTIOn
description:
A game made in a week for Prototype Studio class, at that class, we have a prompt every week, and we are asked to make a game within a week with that prompt. And that week's prompt is a Words as Object! So I made the raCOGNiTIOn.

This is a simple words recognition game, you need to recognize 10 words within 45 seconds. Pretty proud of the visual experience of this game, and I feel the completion screen is very satisfying.
